summary: A Full-Stack Developer committed to creating innovative and efficient solutions that help businesses succeed. Expert in JavaScript, TypeScript, PHP, Go, Node.js, React, and Laravel, with a strong ability to translate complex challenges into elegant, maintainable solutions. Brings a collaborative approach to every project and mentors others on development best practices.

experiences.title: Mid Full Stack Developer
experiences.description: Developing and maintaining full-stack applications, including legacy systems and new platform features like a part-time job web platform.
projects: MemberS : Legacy in-house project management system
responsibilities: Developed and maintained full-stack features across multiple internal and client-facing applications.

Implemented core functionalities such as CRUD modules, point systems, third-party integrations (including Japan banking systems), and AI-Receptionist features (meeting scheduling, appointment flows, notification integrations like ChatWork, AI API integration, and multi-role dashboards).
Collaborated with project managers for requirement analysis and delivery timelines.
Performed code reviews, mentored junior developers, and improved overall codebase quality.
acquiredSkills: Development with modern JavaScript frameworks and backend architectures.
Scalable UI development with advanced state/data management (Redux, TanStack Query).
Layered architecture and clean REST API design in backend development.
Strengthened leadership, code review, and cross-team communication skills.

experiences.title: Full Stack Developer
experiences.description: Delivered full-stack features for the GotChu community platform, including gamification, user onboarding, campaign logic, and admin management tools.
projects: GotChu : Community Application Platform (CMS management, community user registration & onboarding, gamification system with points/badges/levels, community campaigns with daily challenges and streak tracking, admin management dashboard)
responsibilities: Delivered full-stack features for the GotChu community platform, including gamification, user onboarding, campaign logic, and admin management tools.
Developed backend APIs and real-time modules using NestJS, Redis Pub/Sub, and WebSocket communication.
Built responsive, interactive frontend components using React, React Query, TanStack Router, and modern UI libraries.
Worked closely with stakeholders, clients, UI/UX designers, and QA teams to translate requirements into production-ready features.
Ensured high-quality code, modular architecture, and maintainable development practices across the entire stack.

experiences.title: Junior Frontend Developer → Mid Frontend Developer
experiences.description: Contributed to the development of critical financial admin dashboards and provided customer support for payment integrations.
projects: MTB Pay mobile wallet admin dashboard : Mobile wallet application admin dashboard for MTB Bank.
Internal admin dashboards : Payment gateway setup, payment integration tools
responsibilities: Built and maintained key dashboard features: KYC & user management, notification system, electricity bill management, banking transaction & accounting modules, general settings, and role/permission management.
Integrated frontend with backend APIs and handled complex data/state flows.
Collaborated with the UI/UX team for better usability and design accuracy.
Supported customers on payment integration and troubleshooting.
Participated in Agile workflows, code reviews, and continuous improvements.
acquiredSkills: Strong expertise in React, Next.js, TypeScript, Redux Toolkit, and React Query.
Experience developing large-scale admin systems with complex business logic.
Improved ability to convert business needs into reliable technical solutions.
Enhanced teamwork and communication in cross-functional environments.

experiences.title: Frontend Developer
experiences.description: Participated in the frontend development for a dental clinic management application with appointment scheduling, settlement management, inventory management, and invoicing.
projects: Dental clinic management application : Appointment scheduling, settlement management, inventory management, and invoicing
responsibilities: Built core clinic features: appointment scheduling, settlements, inventory flows, and invoicing.
Converted Figma designs into responsive, production-ready components.
Collaborated with UI/UX designers to ensure accurate and feasible design implementation.
Implemented drag-and-drop interactions and advanced form handling for a smooth user experience.
acquiredSkills: Strong proficiency in the React/Next.js ecosystem.
Ability to translate complex Figma designs into functional UI.
Experience building interactive features and managing dynamic state.
Improved communication with designers and project stakeholders.

education.description: Completed an Honours Degree in Computing with First Class Honours, gaining deep knowledge in computing concepts and practical applications. This achievement has equipped me with strong problem-solving abilities and the skills needed to handle real-world challenges in the tech industry.

Expanded expertise in computing with a deeper dive into advanced topics, preparing for a more specialized and detailed understanding of the field, paving the way for further academic pursuits in computing.
Gained essential skills and knowledge in computing, focusing on foundational aspects of IT and computing principles, which provided a strong base for advanced studies in computing.

Studied the foundational concepts of electronic and telecommunication technology, covering the basics in the first and second years, which laid the groundwork for understanding complex electronic and communication systems.
